/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses navigating their way through the urban maze. The buildings that line the street are tall and modern, their glass and concrete facades reflecting the sunlight. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the busy scene below. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and bathing the city in a warm glow.
